actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The scorpion makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 12). The scorpion has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

actions.name: Sting
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10 damage) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
